title: Strengthening Medical Practice Competencies: Analyzing and Applying Cross-Cultural E-Learning Effects: CAP Model Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Can explain e-learning content design principles that consider diverse cultural backgrounds
Conduct a project analyzing cross-cultural learning preference differences by applying the CAP model

Learners analyze formative assessment results (surveys, quizzes, discussion participation) from e-learning courses to propose at least three specific measures for improving cultural relevance (e.g., adding multicultural content, incorporating local cases, enhancing language accessibility) and can explain these measures with an average score of 4/5 or higher on a peer evaluation rubric (clarity, feasibility, effectiveness)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
